mapper.select: SELECT id, name FROM stack WHERE name = #{name}

SELECT s.name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT MIN(jr.id) AS min_id FROM job_recruit jr WHERE jr.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY GROUP BY jr.title, jr.company_id ) AS unique_jobs JOIN job_recruit_stack jrs ON unique_jobs.min_id = jrs.job_recruit_id JOIN stack s ON s.id = jrs.stack_id GROUP BY s.name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
